name: Detailed Oriented
html: You are practiced at scouring for details. You have advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks within 5 feet.

name: Keen Hearing and Smell
html: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing or smell.

name: Musician
html: You are proficient in one musical instrument of your choice.

name: Naturally Stealthy
html: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is your size or larger than you.

name: Nimble Escape
html: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

name: Programmer

effect.note: Gain expertise on Intelligence (Technology) checks related to computers

html: Whenever you make an Intelligence (Technology) check related to computers, you are considered to have expertise in the Technology skill.

name: Shrewd
html: You are proficient in the Insight and Deception skills.

name: Sonic Sensitivity

effect.note: against effects that would deal sonic damage

html: Your powerful sense of hearing makes you especially vulnerable to deafening sounds. You have disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal sonic damage (explained in chapter 9).

name: Trance
html: You only need 3 hours of sleep during a long rest to gain its benefits, instead of 6. Additionally, if your long rest would be interrupted, you only need to complete the long rest instead of restarting it to gain its benefits.
